Package com.core.adnsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdListener
    The listener of AdView.
    AdObject.LoadListener  
    AdPoolListener
    The listener of AdView for container based view, such as ListView, RecyclerView, etc.
    AdRenderer
    AdRenderer defines interfaces of operating AdViews, such as Banner, Card, Interstitial, etc.
    RecyclerAdRenderer
    RecyclerAdRenderer defines interfaces of operating AdViews for RecyclerView, such as Banner, Card, etc.
    SDKDeviceInfo.GAIdTaskListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdBaseSpec
    The base spec of Ad.
    AdCustom
    AdCustom is used to create Banner, Card views.
    AdDelegator
    The AdDelegator.
    AdInterstitial
    AdInterstitial is used to show Interstitial.
    AdInterstitialSpec
    The spec of AdInterstitial.
    AdInterstitialView
    The interstitial view.
    AdListenerAdapter
    The default adapter of AdListener.
    ADN
    The global interfaces of ADN SDK.
    AdObject
    AdObject contains all Ad materials, e.g., title, ad type, trigger url...
    AdPoolListenerAdapter
    The default adapter of AdPoolListener.
    AdResourceSpec
    The resource spec of AdView.
    AdResourceSpec.Spec  
    AdView
    AdView is used to create Banner, Card views.
    BannerAdRenderer
    Default BannerAdRenderer of SDK.
    BannerViewBinder
    BannerViewBinder is used to build custom layout of BannerAd.
    BannerViewBinder.Builder  
    BannerViewHolder
    BannerViewHolder is used to hold views of layoutView in order to improve performance.
    BaseViewHolder
    The base view holder.
    BitmapUtils
    The utilities for bitmap.
    CardAdRenderer
    Default CardAdRenderer of SDK.
    CardViewBinder
    CardViewBinder is used to build custom layout of CardAd.
    CardViewBinder.Builder  
    CardViewHolder
    CardViewHolder is used to hold views of layoutView in order to improve performance.
    CharacterInputFilter
    The input filter of character which is used to filter out characters exceeded maximum capacity.
    ExpandScreenVideoActivity
    The video activity played in full screen.
    ExpandScreenVideoFragment
    The video fragment played in full screen.
    FullScreenVideoActivity
    The video activity played in full screen.
    FullScreenVideoFragment
    The video fragment played in full screen.
    GifView
    The view used for displaying GIF.
    InterstitialActivity
    The interstitial activity.
    InterstitialAdRenderer
    Default InterstitialAdRenderer of SDK.
    InterstitialFragment
    The interstitial fragment.
    InterstitialViewBinder
    InterstitialViewBinder is used to build custom layout of InterstitialAd.
    InterstitialViewBinder.Builder  
    InterstitialViewHolder
    InterstitialViewHolder is used to hold views of layoutView in order to improve performance.
    NativeAdAdapter
    NativeAdAdapter is used to create Banner, Card views for ListView.
    ParcelParameter
    The parameters used for parcelable objects.
    RecyclerAdapter
    RecyclerAdapter is used to create Banner, Card views for RecyclerView.
    RecyclerBannerAdRenderer
    Default Recycler BannerAdRenderer of SDK.
    RecyclerBannerViewBinder
    RecyclerBannerViewBinder is used to build custom layout of RecyclerBannerAd.
    RecyclerBannerViewBinder.Builder  
    RecyclerBannerViewHolder
    RecyclerBannerViewHolder is used to hold views of layoutView in order to improve performance.
    RecyclerBaseViewHolder
    The base view holder of RecyclerView.
    RecyclerCardAdRenderer
    Default Recycler CardAdRenderer of SDK.
    RecyclerCardViewBinder
    RecyclerCardViewBinder is used to build custom layout of RecyclerCardAd.
    RecyclerCardViewBinder.Builder  
    RecyclerCardViewHolder
    RecyclerCardViewHolder is used to hold views of layoutView in order to improve performance.
